item.title: Donald Trump’s Dislike for Ukraine Is Deeply Personal
item.description: His tone and false claims can be explained by personal history more than anything else.

item.title: President Trump, Please Staple (Conditional) Green Cards to Graduate Degrees
item.description: We can make sure that some of the best talent from abroad that gets trained here stays here and doesn’t end up working for America’s enemies.
